name: Who's Home?
description:
Who's Home?

0.1-0.2: Who's Home? is a game I came up with while scrolling through Itch.io, so far I've spent around 24 hours on the game, unfortunately my brain capacity is not big enough to think of a end goal so you just walk around in a creepy house, if you have a idea of what the end goal should be please comment below. 

0.3:  this game finally has a end goal: find the key and unlock the door, I've implemented a grab feature so you can pick things up and rotate them, I added 2 new rooms and added a main menu, and I've finally fixed THE game breaking bug that is the reason why I didn't release this version any earlier, now that I've driven over a road bump you can expect more updates.
